text: Va kasonero, ki nifoq varzidand [niz] ma'lum dorad, ki [cun] ʙa eşon gufta şud: "Bijoed, dar rohi Alloh taolo ʙiçanged jo [az xonavoda va qaʙilaaton] difo' kuned". Guftand: "Agar medonistem, çange rūj xohad dod, hatman, az şumo pajravī mekardem". Onon dar on hangom ʙa kufr nazdiktar ʙudand to imon; ʙa zaʙoni xeş cize megūjand, ki dar dilhojaşon nest va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci [dar dil] pinhon mekunand, ogohtar ast
